abstract: Michael Egan, the accuser in a series of suits, has dropped his complaint against David Neuman, a former Disney television executive.
snippet: Michael Egan, the accuser in a series of suits, has dropped his complaint against David Neuman, a former Disney television executive.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — Michael Egan, the accuser in a series of Hollywood sex-abuse lawsuits, has dropped his complaint against David Neuman, a former Disney television executive.

headline.main: A Hollywood Sexual-Abuse Suit Is Dropped
